## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.drawImage() method

Draw an image to the canvas at the specified coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
drawImage(image: NINodeCanvasImageSource, dx: number, dy: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  image | <code>NINodeCanvasImageSource</code> | The image to draw. |
|  dx | <code>number</code> | The x coordinate to draw the image to. |
|  dy | <code>number</code> | The y coordinate to draw the image to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
